main event: A white circular object, the size of a pea, was observed traveling from southeast to northwest over Albuquerque, N.M. for 7 seconds.
interesting points: The object had a sharp outline and was visible at dawn under clear conditions., The sighting lasted for 7 seconds before the object disappeared behind terrain., The observer reported the object moving a good distance in that short time., Initial observation was at an elevation of 45 degrees., The report concludes that the object is possibly astronomical, although there is insufficient data.
witness description: The observer was looking north at the time of the sighting.
